summary: This is an email chain from August 5, 2020, forwarding a draft UMR (likely 'Urgent Memorandum Report') from MLARS (Money Laundering and Asset Recovery Section) concerning Deutsche Bank. The email discusses the timing of the report's submission and an associated investigative step.

events.title: Draft UMR on Deutsche Bank Prepared
events.description: The Money Laundering and Asset Recovery Section (MLARS) prepared a draft Urgent Memorandum Report concerning Deutsche Bank. Its submission is being held pending a briefing on an investigative step.

keyFacts: A draft Urgent Memorandum Report (UMR) from the DOJ's Money Laundering and Asset Recovery Section (MLARS) concerning Deutsche Bank was circulated on August 5, 2020.
The report's submission was being held pending a briefing on an unspecified 'investigative step'.
The email chain indicates internal DOJ coordination and review processes for sensitive investigative reports.
